General.Name: Malath Cooperative Insurance Co
General.Description: Malath Cooperative Insurance Company provides insurance products and related services to individuals, small and medium enterprises, and corporates in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Medical, Motor, Fire and Burglary, Marine, Engineering, Public Liability, General Accident, Inherent Defects, and Others segments. It offers marine cargo insurance in transit and ships against marine perils; engineering insurance for loss or damage to construction works or erection and installation of plant and machinery; and personal accident, and workmen compensation insurance products. Malath Cooperative Insurance Company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Prince Mohammed Bin Abdulaziz Road, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11625
